text: Peter Gruber may refer to: * Peter Gruber (born 1929), Hungarian-born American philanthropist, see Peter and Patricia Gruber Foundation * Peter M. Gruber (1941–2017), Austrian mathematician * Peter Gruber (footballer) (born 1952), German footballer ==See also== * Peter Guber (born 1942), film studio executive, sports team owner, entrepreneur
title: Peter Gruber
